root: ^It's been a week since my suspension started.
^Today's 8th April, I'm supposed to go to school today.
^But what will I do about her, Sakamoto Aoi...
^No, that's not the problem, what matters right now is, how will I act around her,
^What will she do when she sees me, Should I apologise today?
^I’ll ask her to listen to me one last time, and then I'll try to tell her about my stupid situation.
^I should get ready for school, its getting late.
